scripts.install:all: npm run install:services && npm run install:shared
scripts.install:services: for dir in services/*; do (cd "$dir" && npm install); done
scripts.dev: docker-compose up -d && concurrently "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:post" "npm run dev:comment" "npm run dev:chat" "npm run dev:media" "npm run dev:notification" "npm run dev:analytics" "npm run dev:search"
scripts.build:services: for dir in services/*; do (cd "$dir" && npm run build); done
scripts.test:services: for dir in services/*; do (cd "$dir" && npm test); done
scripts.db:generate: for dir in services/*; do (cd "$dir" && npm run db:generate); done
scripts.db:migrate: for dir in services/*; do (cd "$dir" && npm run db:migrate); done
scripts.db:seed: for dir in services/*; do (cd "$dir" && npm run db:seed); done
